name: John P. LASKARIS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Attorney General of Pennsylvania, Erie County District Attorney, Appellees

parties: John P. LASKARIS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Attorney General of Pennsylvania, Erie County District Attorney, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of July, 2009, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

977 A.2d 1087
